Account
Start

Navigate to Settings?
I want to ask about my account
Can I delete my account?
What if I forget my password?
Can multiple account manage the same device?
Unfortunately, you can not delete your account.
You can create a new account and scan the bar code on the Device.
Yes, as long as they have scanned the same barcode
I want to ask about temperature
What is the best temperature for newborn cat?
>What is the best temperature for newborn dog?
What is the best temperature for Hatching Eggs?
30–31°C (This is from online research)
29.5–32°C(This is from online research)
37–39°C(This is from online research)
I want to ask about app functionalities
Temperature limitation system
Where can update upper/lower temperature limit?
How can I control different device?
What if I lost internect connection?
You can update upper/lower temperature limit in the setting page.
In the setting page: \n 1.You can scan the bar code on the machine; \n 2.You can type the device ID.
We also provide control on through the hardware.
Temperature adjustment system
How can I adjust desired temperature?
What is the range of desired temperature?
How to cool the container
You can drag the circular bar at main page.
The hardware is capable of start heating from 0–100 degree.
Unfortunately, the hardware does not provide active cooling.
History readings system
How many historical readings does this app display?
What is the time interval between read point on the graph?
Can we view more historical readings?
The app is capable of display up to 10 historical readings.
It depends on the hardware. The app will show 10 most recent reading from the hardware.
Unfortunately, plan to allow paid user to view more historical readings.
Support
